projects.title: Fuity Board
projects.short_desc: Upload pictures with fruits, filter them with google API and add comments.

desc.title: Fruity Board
desc.text: In this project I've used Vue.js for the first time. Inspiration came with love for colors, taste and beautiful symmetrical patterns of fruits. Main conception was to give opportunity to share images where is at least one visible random fruit. Uploaded pictures are filtered with help of the Google API, pictures without fruits are rejected.  When uploading pictures you can add: title, author, tags and description.

desc.title: Frontend
desc.text: To build a frontend I used pure HTML/CSS.

desc.title: Backend
desc.text: Backend was build with PostgreSQL for database and Node.js with Express server for the rest. Uploaded pictures are sent to AWS S3, in database are stored only URLs. When the picture is rejected you can see the message.

desc.title: Routing
desc.text: To navigate to different sites I'm using Hash-Routing - selected picture can be send to someone with URL.

desc.title: Interaction
desc.text: Click on the picture to make it bigger and read comments. Now you can add comments using your own nick :) You can also navigate through pictures using left and right arrows and X for closing the modal.

desc.title: Responsiveness
desc.text: According to the rule mobile first, page is fully responsive.

projects.title: Spotify Search
projects.short_desc: Search for albums or artists using Spotify API. Find your favorite artist without logging in!

desc.title: Frontend
desc.text: Everything was build using HTML/CSS.

desc.title: Features
desc.text: For connecting with API in order to fetch the data from Spotify Api I'm using AJAX. When you scroll down to the bottom of the results page infinite scroll will fetch next data and add to to previous. Page is responsive.

projects.title: Petition
projects.short_desc: Sign the petition to save the trees!

desc.title: Frontend
desc.text: To build a frontend I used pure HTML/CSS.

desc.title: Backend
desc.text: Backend is build with Node.js, Express.js, and PostgreSQL. Data base is created to store user informations necessary for authentication. Everything is protected from CSURF attacks and SQL injections. For rendering different HTML templates is used Handlebars.js

desc.title: Features
desc.text: To sing the petition you need to register creating your account.
If you already have an account you can log in.
You sing the petition using virtual sign in canvas which is stored in data base as a string.
There is possibility to see all signers.
If it will be necessary you can delete your signature or change your profile informations.
Page is fully responsive.

projects.title: Connect Four
projects.short_desc: Game for 2 players based on the original board game.

desc.title: Logic
desc.text: Whole logic game was built with Java Script and jQuery.

desc.title: Features
desc.text: Game has a counter for both players. You can reset the game. Result of the game is stored in local storage so even after closing web window and opening it again you will see result. Always in the end of the battle you can see cheesy animation where game board is destroyed.

desc.title: Accessibility
desc.text: You can play the game just using left/right arrow to move pointer and enter to admit chosen column.

projects.title: Simple To Do
projects.short_desc: To Do List - add, edit, delete.

desc.text: Very simple to do list app made as a practice of CRUD. Technologies I've used: React.js and bootstrap for front end, and node.js, postgreSQL for back end. All you can do is add, update and delete list elements.

projects.title: Rick and Morty API
projects.short_desc: Search for your favorite Rick and Morty cartoon characters using API.

desc.title: Frontend
desc.text: React.js, HTML/CSS, Bootstrap

desc.title: Features

Navigate through the search results using pagination.
See details about choosen character.

desc.title: Responsiveness
desc.text: Page is fully responsive.

projects.title: Ecommerce
projects.short_desc: Online shop made from scratch with Braintree(PayPal Company) integration.

desc.title: Frontend
desc.text: React.js, CSS/HTML, Bootstrap

desc.title: Backend
desc.text: Node.js, Express.js, MongoDB. Shop has admin and user routes which gives option of adding categories and products through the admin dashboard. Authentication is based on JWT.

desc.title: Features
desc.text: Some of the shop features: create account, login, search for products using search bar and category filters or price filters, see most popular products or newest products, add product to card, remove product from card.
Filter products by categories or price range
Card summary
User Dashboard

desc.title: Responsiveness
desc.text: Page is fully responsive.

desc.title: Future Features
desc.text: Edit user profile, purchase history, PayPal payments, manage orders and products by admin, SSL to secure app.

projects.title: Socialnetwork
projects.short_desc: Create account, add profile picture, add friends, search for friends, take part in group chat.

desc.title: Frontend
desc.text: HTML/CSS, React.js

desc.title: Backend
desc.text: Node.js, Express.js, PostgreSQL, AWS S3 for storing pictures with reference in database, passwords are salted-hashed and encrypted with Node and Bcrypt, Cookie Session takes care about already logged in user, page is protected from SQL injections and CSURF attacks, Socket.io protocol for chat feature

desc.title: Features
desc.text: Create account
Logged in user profile page
Edit user profile
Upload profile picture
See your friends and your friends invitations
Other user profile, add friend by sending invitation
Take part in a group chat
Search for friends
Reset password with AWS ses
